name: Animated Category
author: Nasirul Islam

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ‘anim-cat.php’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go your Appearance option and select widget option.
  4. Drag and drop Animated widget where you need.

sections.description:
Animated Category plugin easily is an high customizable and responsive widget for displaying category. This plugin also customize widget color. Count category on off facilities also included.

Demo Plugin
